org.docheinstein.mp3doctor.ui.groups.artists

Class ArtistDetailsController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.docheinstein.mp3doctor.ui.groups.artists.ArtistDetailsController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InstantiableController, InstantiableControllerView, InstantiableReinitializableControllerView, Reinitializable

    public class ArtistDetailsController
extends java.lang.Object
implements InstantiableReinitializableControllerView
    Represents a controller that handle an artist's details; shows and let them to be saved to the disk.

      • mArtist

        private MusicArtistObservableFileWrapper mArtist
        The underlying artist this controller is handling. The reason why a MusicArtistObservableFileWrapper wrapper is needed instead of a simple artist is that in this way the instance of artist can be changed (e.g. from SoloMusicArtist to MusicGroup) and the wrapper is able to notify the change in order to let the listeners to be consistent with the update.

      • mCurrentArtistType

        private MusicArtistFactory.MusicArtistType mCurrentArtistType
        Current selected type of artist (reflects the UI).
